SELECT s.id, CONCAT(IFNULL( m.merchant_name,''), '-', IFNULL( s.shop_name,'') ) AS shop_name, s.shop_code FROM inno72_shops s LEFT JOIN inno72_activity_shops acs ON s.id = acs.shops_id LEFT JOIN inno72_merchant m ON m.id = s.seller_id WHERE s.is_delete=0 and acs.activity_id = #{activityId}
and ( s.shop_name LIKE '%${keyword}%' or s.shop_code LIKE '%${keyword}%' or m.merchant_name LIKE '%${keyword}%' or m.merchant_code LIKE '%${keyword}%' )

SELECT s.id, m.merchant_name AS seller_id, CONCAT(IFNULL( m.merchant_name,''), '-', IFNULL( s.shop_name,'') ) AS shop_name, s.shop_code FROM inno72_shops s LEFT JOIN inno72_merchant m ON m.id = s.seller_id WHERE s.is_delete=0 and s.seller_id = #{sellerId}
and ( s.shop_name LIKE '%${keyword}%' or s.shop_code LIKE '%${keyword}%' or m.merchant_name LIKE '%${keyword}%' or m.merchant_code LIKE '%${keyword}%' )
SELECT count(1) FROM inno72_activity where shop_id=#{id} and is_delete = 0
SELECT count(1) FROM inno72_shops s where s.is_delete = 0 and s.shop_code =#{code}
